article_title: Counicil member Robert Castleberry to seek re-election of Ward 3
article_text:
Norman, OK (73070)

Today

Partly to mostly cloudy with isolated thunderstorms developing during the afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 84F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. Low near 65F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

og.description: Ward 3 City Councilman Robert Castleberry announced this week that he will seek re-election.
